about.title: About Me
about.p1: I'm a student at Fatec SO.
about.p2: I like using, studying and supporting Free Software, so I use GNU/Linux as my main OS, and am currently testing OpenBSD and FreeBSD .
about.p3:
My current setup consists of Arch Linux as my OS, Neovim as my text editor, i3 as my Window Manager, St as my terminal emulator and Bash as my shell.
Additionally, I use Brave as my main web browser.
about.p4: I'm currently studying japanese and am a Weeb (as you can see by the images on this website).

proj.title: My (few) projects
proj.min: Min Start: A minimalist start page for graphical browsers, with my most accessed websites
proj.spells: Spells 'n' Curses: A simple rogue-like game, written using ncurses.
